subject: College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Penn State faced the threat of a four-year ban on playing football before the N.C.A.A. issued its punishment Monday for how it handled the Jerry Sandusky child molesting scandal, a university spokesman said.
snippet: Penn State faced the threat of a four-year ban on playing football before the N.C.A.A. issued its punishment Monday for how it handled the Jerry Sandusky child molesting scandal, a university spokesman said.
